text:
<皆さん
何でもありません
どうかお気に
なさらず>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.67%;top: 0.40%;width: 15.64%;height: 2.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text: 興味深いな…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 54.41%;top: 1.41%;width: 12.98%;height: 0.96%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
あなたが
彼女の夫
ですね?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 68.67%;top: 1.92%;width: 12.55%;height: 1.57%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
どうして
そう言える?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.80%;top: 11.55%;width: 10.21%;height: 1.74%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
姉妹が有名な作家と
結婚したのは知っていますし
あなたは私を見て逃げないから。
多少は人と会ったり表を歩いて
姿を見られることもありますが
他の国ほど大げさな
反応をしないのは故郷の
この国の人位ですよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 34.41%;top: 14.10%;width: 24.47%;height: 3.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 35%;

text:
じゃ紹介は
必要ない
かな?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.24%;top: 23.47%;width: 13.19%;height: 1.60%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
えぇ
お元気そうですね
サム
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.14%;top: 25.61%;width: 13.19%;height: 1.48%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
君達が
ヨリの娘ね!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.76%;top: 29.08%;width: 12.66%;height: 2.02%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text: そうです!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.16%;top: 31.55%;width: 8.19%;height: 1.62%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text: 私はミツ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 61.44%;top: 28.59%;width: 8.83%;height: 1.03%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text: 私はモモ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 71.97%;top: 29.27%;width: 9.57%;height: 0.94%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
日本へようこそ
エミコ叔母さん!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 61.65%;top: 35.56%;width: 16.91%;height: 1.48%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
ご丁寧に
どうも
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 29.52%;top: 38.00%;width: 12.13%;height: 1.03%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
人形を探してる
アーマを見つけて
幸運でしたよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 29.84%;top: 39.15%;width: 17.55%;height: 1.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
私達が
いなければ
迷子ですよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 65.80%;top: 37.82%;width: 11.91%;height: 1.95%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
その通りよアーマ
いとこと叔母に
会えたのは幸運ね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.93%;top: 46.08%;width: 19.04%;height: 1.53%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
着陸から
1時間も経たずに
約束破って!
見つから
なかったら
どうするのよ!
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 61.44%;top: 46.03%;width: 11.81%;height: 2.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 30%;

text:
あの…少し助言ねエミコ。
娘達の言葉は本気にしないで。
彼女達はあなたの思う程
良い子じゃないの
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.22%;top: 55.75%;width: 21.17%;height: 2.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
そうだとしても
はぐれないように
してもらわないと
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 25.59%;top: 63.56%;width: 16.38%;height: 1.50%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
安全じゃないのは理解して
特に旅行中はね、分かった?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 62.18%;top: 55.89%;width: 26.81%;height: 1.60%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
旅行の話は
行く前にすべきね
目立ち過ぎよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 38.88%;top: 65.52%;width: 19.04%;height: 1.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
車に行くまで
手を繋いでね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 73.14%;top: 65.54%;width: 14.36%;height: 1.62%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<で…あれが
私達のいとこ?>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 25.90%;top: 78.57%;width: 13.72%;height: 2.14%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<あまり
印象無いわね>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.59%;top: 87.49%;width: 16.06%;height: 1.50%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<彼女がアンタを
地面に叩きつけたのは
笑える話ね>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 67.39%;top: 78.40%;width: 28.72%;height: 2.09%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<もう
マグレ当たりよ
妙な髪もあったし>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 75.90%;top: 87.11%;width: 22.13%;height: 1.85%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<おじいちゃんを
唸らすには
もっとやらないと>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.41%;top: 89.88%;width: 18.51%;height: 2.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<それは
確かね
でも…>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 7.39%;top: 94.30%;width: 12.55%;height: 1.76%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
<おじいちゃんと会う前に
彼女がどんなものか
見ておこうかな>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 55.90%;top: 89.51%;width: 24.36%;height: 2.32%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text: <楽しみね>
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 80.80%;top: 90.52%;width: 15.53%;height: 2.04%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;font-weight: bold;
